sect2.title: Installation of Ncurses
sect2.para: When cross-compiling, Ncurses doesn't always properly create the file ncurses/comp_captab.c which results in build failures. Fix this issue by updating ncurses with a rollup patch released on 2005/03/19:

The Ncurses package will use the environment variables CC and CXX in preference to variables you may pass to the configure script. To force ncurses to use our build flags we temporarily set CC and CXX:

listitem.para: This tells Ncurses not to build its Ada bindings, even if an Ada compiler is installed on the host. This needs to be done because once we enter the chroot environment, Ada will no longer be available.
This tells Ncurses to install its header files into /tools/include, instead of /tools/include/ncurses, to ensure that other packages can find the Ncurses headers successfully.
